rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand you would like to see changes to the way that Government and the police deal with knife crime, but we're not sure what exact action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.

We currently have the below petitions open on this topic, which you might like to sign:

Increase penalties for knife crime offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618505

Launch a national public awareness campaign about knife crime
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608683

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.
